imageGeneration.messageTitle: Access to all image generation features requires Lamix Premium
imageGeneration.messageText: To enjoy all image generation models and features, please subscribe to Lamix Premium.

unlock_more_customization_fields: Unlock more customization fields with Lamix Premium
chat_with_unique_ai_girlfriend: Chat with a unique AI girlfriend
with_lamix_you_can_create_your_ideal_cha: With Lamix, you can create your ideal character in any style and generate images via chat with that character.
image_generation_create_your_ideal_ai_be: Image generation: Easily create your ideal AI beauty from text
create_ai_beauties_from_text_or_images_i: Create AI beauties from text or images in a few simple steps.
imagine_and_the_ideal_image_is_right_in_: Imagine, and the ideal image is right in front of you!
with_lamix_select_your_favorite_pose_fro: With Lamix, simply select your favorite pose from the menu or describe the image you want in the chat, and the character will easily generate the image.
create_ai_beauty_from_text: Create an AI beauty from text
just_enter_text_to_create_ideal_ai_beaut: Just enter text to easily create your ideal AI beauty or pretty girl.
enjoy_image_generation_in_different_scen: Enjoy image generation in different scenarios while chatting with a beautiful AI woman! Maybe you'll fall in love?
how_to_create_ai_beauty: How to create an AI beauty?
can_i_create_ai_beauties_for_free: Can I create AI beauties for free?
step_1: 1. Click the 'Generate an AI beauty' button.
step_2: 2. Enter a description or prompt of the AI beauty you imagine.
step_3: 3. Choose the style of the AI beauty and click 'Generate'.
yes_free_signup_for_credits: Yes, by signing up for free, you will receive credits (points) that will allow you to create AI beauties for free with your credits.
ai_beauty_description: An AI beauty refers to an image of a beautiful woman generated by AI. It generally refers to an image of a woman created artificially or the face of a woman generated according to beauty criteria learned by AI.
ai_gravure_special_photos: Special Photos Sent from AI Gravure
ai_gravure_description: While chatting with AI Gravure on Lamix, captivating photos are sent one after another during the conversation. The photos sent by AI Gravure are beautiful scenes, as if you‚Äôre catching a glimpse of their world. Enjoy a unique experience, drawn into the moment, and savor special times with the character.
asked_for_new_image: I asked for a new image
seo_title_default: Latest Posts from the Community | LAMIX
seo_description_default: With Lamix, you can easily create posts using images generated during a chat with AI Gravure, for free.
seo_description_query: Displaying search results for ${query}. Find your favorite images on Lamix.
free_ai_chat_and_image_generation: Free AI Chat and Image Generation Site
no_subscription: You don't have a subscription yet.
info_updated_successfully: The information has been updated successfully.
image_generation_processing: The image is being generated now
select_pose_for_image_generation: Please select a pose for image generation.
moreCoins: You need more coins to continue
generateImage: Click here to generate an image
thankYou: Thank you for using our application.
confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete this?
tagCopied: Tag copied. Paste it where you want to place the chatbot.

conversationStarter.prompt: This is a prompt for a web application. Please naturally initiate a conversation as if we were complete strangers.
conversationStarter.useTime: Use the current time (%{time}) to offer a timely and friendly greeting.
conversationStarter.dontStartWithConfirmation: Do not start with a confirmation; begin with the answer.

loginStarter.prompt: Greet the user, then introduce yourself by stating your name.

enjoyConversations: Enjoy more conversations with AI characters using a free account!
contactUs: You can contact us anytime from here

discover.content: Chat with beautiful girls and receive exclusive photos from them! Simply choose a pretty girl that catches your eye and start chatting right away. Get to know her better, share moments, and enjoy a fun, engaging conversation. It's as easy as selecting and starting your chat!

nickName.title: Nickname
nickName.subTitle: The name you want the character to call you

authMail.registerDescription: Start enjoying conversations with AI characters with a free account!
authMail.loginDescription: Log in to chat happily with diverse AI characters!
authMail.privacyNote: Your privacy is very important to us, and the information provided will not be used for any purpose other than intended.
authMail.privacyDescription: Protecting your privacy is of utmost importance to us. The following policies describe how we handle your information.
authMail.dataUsage: We strictly manage personal information (name, email address, etc.) provided by you and do not disclose it to third parties without consent.
authMail.dataProtection: We implement reasonable measures to securely store your data and protect it from unauthorized access, loss, or destruction.
authMail.infoSharingDetails: We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent unless required by law.
authMail.cookiesDetails: Our website uses cookies to improve services.
authMail.contactDetails: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy, please contact us via the contact form.

setting.requirementsDescription: To create a new password, it must meet all of the following criteria:
setting.differentPassword: Must not be the same as previous password

newCharacter.imageStyleSelectionDescription: Choose an image style for your character. You can select from various options like anime or realistic styles to best match your character's theme. Click on the styles below to preview and select.
newCharacter.characterPhysicalDescriptionDescription: In this section, you can define your character's physical traits, such as appearance, height, skin tone, and other distinctive features. This will help bring your character to life with detailed visual attributes.
newCharacter.characterPersonalityDescription: This section allows you to define your character's personality, tone, and moral compass. Choose attributes that best represent how your character behaves, their motivations, strengths, and weaknesses.
newCharacter.image_generated_successfully: The image has been generated successfully.
newCharacter.generation_error: An error occurred during the generation of the prompt or the image.
newCharacter.image_generation_failure: The image generation task failed to start. Please try again.
newCharacter.image_generation_start: The image generation task has started. Checking the status...
newCharacter.character_appearance_description: Please describe the character's appearance. Example: Female, blonde hair, long hair, wearing a black dress, drinking coffee at a cafe.
newCharacter.image_generation_message: Currently generating 4 images. Please wait for about a minute.
newCharacter.characterPromptPlaceholder: Please enter a detailed description of the character...
newCharacter.enhancedPromptPlaceholder: The AI-enhanced prompt will be displayed here...
newCharacter.markdownInfo: You can enter details in Markdown format.
newCharacter.imageGenerationError: An error occurred during image generation.
newCharacter.imageGenerationTimeout: Image generation timed out. Please try again.
newCharacter.aiHiddenMessage: I liked one of your pictures
newCharacter.aiInstruction: Thank me and comment about the moment you took the picture.

imageGenerationError: An error occurred during image generation.
imageGenerationTimeout: Image generation timed out. Please try again.
aiInstruction: Thank me and comment about the moment you took the picture.
